https://tmrev.io/movie/184561-A Life Among Whales 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Weaving together natural history and biography, this film is a fascinating exploration into the unique relationship between humans and whales as told by renowned whale biologist and activist Dr. Roger Payne. A pioneer in whale song research, Payne has passionately promoted the protection of these majestic sea creatures for four decades and continues to do so by studying ocean pollution. A Life Among Whales
